BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection, Resiliency and Waterfronts

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring review of the long-term sustainability plan by the environmental justice advisory board
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring review of the long-term sustainability plan by the environmental justice advisory board.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the reporting requirements of the office of long-term planning and sustainability, and to repeal sections 3-123, 3-126, 24-806, and 24-808 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the New York city climate change adaptation task force, New York city energy policy, a wind resource assessment, and the citywide climate adaption plan, respectively
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting requirements of the office of long-term planning and sustainability, and to repeal sections 3-123, 3-126, 24-806, and 24-808 of the administrative code of the city of New York.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to maintenance easements for post-construction stormwater management facilities and civil penalties for violations of the water pollution control code
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Maintenance easements for post-construction stormwater management facilities and civil penalties for violations of the water pollution control code.
